[STRUCTURE]: The text jumps between different narratives (the author's experience and the two young men's experiences) without clear transitions.
[LOGIC]: The connection between the author's personal experience and the broader discussion about teaching as a profession is not always clear.
[CLARITY]: Some sentences are overly long and complex, making it difficult to follow the main points.
[TRANSITION]: The transition between the first young man's story and the second young man's story is abrupt and lacks a clear connection.

"wnen I meet" instead of "when I meet"
"The time is rapidly drawing to a close when mediocre preparation will be accepted" (awkward phrasing)
